metadata.description: Specialized Claude Code subagents for WhylLima project - Laravel specialists and Business & Product specialists

plugins.name: whyll-agents
plugins.description: Laravel specialist agents for WhylLima project - Full-stack, model builder, API layer, endpoint, test, and job specialists using Laravel 12, PHP 8.3, UUID-based models, and Service-Repository pattern

plugins.name: whyll-agents-biz
plugins.description: Business and product specialist agents - product strategy, UX research, business analysis, content marketing, project management, customer success, legal, sales, scrum, technical writing. Discovery pipeline: PM → UX research → BA → content.
